column2: Century Communities, Inc. engages in the development, design, construction, marketing and sale of single-family attached and detached homes. The company is headquartered in Greenwood Village, Colorado and currently employs 1,389 full-time employees. The firm offers attached and detached homes in metropolitan areas in Colorado, Austin and San Antonio, Texas; Houston, Texas; Las Vegas, Nevada, and Atlanta, Georgia. The firm's homebuilding operations are organized into six segments, which include Atlanta, Central Texas, Colorado, Houston, Nevada, and Utah. In many of its projects, in addition to building homes, it is also responsible for the entitlement and development of the underlying land. The firm acquires land for homebuilding operations with the primary intent to develop and construct single family detached or attached homes for sale on the acquired land. The company builds and sells a range of home types across a variety of price points. The company focuses on assisting homebuyers in obtaining financing by arranging with mortgage lenders to offer qualified buyers a range of financing options.
